attributes.action: Reconsider the referendum result as millions have changed their minds.
attributes.additional_details:
Additionally , the following falsehoods were peddled:
Turkey about to join EU.
Britain compelled to join European army.
Access to single market without free movement.
Sovereignty-UK is sovereign in all major respects.
Absurd ,vague and unresearched claims about the sort and long term economic future , disproved by all knowledgeable authorities.
 A result achieved by falsification cannot be right .
attributes.background: The electorate was misled and the results invalidated by disinformation and lies. In particular, the false claim that EU membership costs £350 million a week and the dishonest pledge to spend this on the NHS. These were demonstrable lies and have been revealed as such but were never withdrawn.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like the UK not to leave the EU, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606

If you would like Parliament to decide on the UK's membership of the EU:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
